raw_comment:
Looking at the graph I notice that the majority of 15-24 year olds are convinced that newer generations are making the world a better place.

I wonder if the people who’s opinions for the world changing and becoming better will actually do something about changing the world.

I wouldn’t say it relates to me very much. Most of the people I hear talking about the world say it’s just getting worse.

Catchy headline: The World is changing?
ace_sentences: I notice that a majority of 15-24 year olds are convinced that newer generations make the world a better place.
I wonder if the people who think that the world is changing and becoming better will do something to change the world.
I do not say that this relates to me very much.
I hear people talking about the world.
Most of these people say that the world is getting worse.
The headline is: The world is changing?
